verses.text_plain: The word of the Lord that came to Micah the Morasthite in the days of Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah, kings of Judah, which he saw concerning Samaria and Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html: 1The word of the Lord that came to Micah the Morasthite in the days of Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah, kings of Judah, which he saw concerning Samaria and Jerusalem.

verses.text_plain: Hear, all ye people; hearken, O earth, and all that therein is: and let the Lord God be witness against you, the Lord from his holy temple.
verses.verse_html:
2Hear, all ye people; hearken, O earth, and all that therein is: and let the Lord God be witness against you, the Lord from his holy temple. ▼
▼ all ye…: Heb. ye people, all of them
 , ▼
▼ all that…: Heb. the fulness thereof

footnotes.body_text: ▼ all ye…: Heb. ye people, all of them
footnotes.body_html: ▼ all ye…: Heb. ye people, all of them

footnotes.body_text: ▼ all that…: Heb. the fulness thereof
footnotes.body_html: ▼ all that…: Heb. the fulness thereof

verses.text_plain: For, behold, the Lord cometh forth out of his place, and will come down, and tread upon the high places of the earth.
verses.verse_html: 3For, behold, the Lord cometh forth out of his place, and will come down, and tread upon the high places of the earth.

verses.text_plain: And the mountains shall be molten under him, and the valleys shall be cleft, as wax before the fire, and as the waters that are poured down a steep place.
verses.verse_html:
4And the mountains shall be molten under him, and the valleys shall be cleft, as wax before the fire, and as the waters that are poured down a steep place. ▼
▼ a steep…: Heb. a descent

footnotes.body_html: ▼ a steep…: Heb. a descent

verses.text_plain: For the transgression of Jacob is all this, and for the sins of the house of Israel. What is the transgression of Jacob? is it not Samaria? and what are the high places of Judah? are they not Jerusalem?
verses.verse_html: 5For the transgression of Jacob is all this, and for the sins of the house of Israel. What is the transgression of Jacob? is it not Samaria? and what are the high places of Judah? are they not Jerusalem?

tokens.text: all this, and for the sins

verses.text_plain: Therefore I will make Samaria as an heap of the field, and as plantings of a vineyard: and I will pour down the stones thereof into the valley, and I will discover the foundations thereof.
verses.verse_html: 6Therefore I will make Samaria as an heap of the field, and as plantings of a vineyard: and I will pour down the stones thereof into the valley, and I will discover the foundations thereof.

verses.text_plain: And all the graven images thereof shall be beaten to pieces, and all the hires thereof shall be burned with the fire, and all the idols thereof will I lay desolate: for she gathered it of the hire of an harlot, and they shall return to the hire of an harlot.
verses.verse_html: 7And all the graven images thereof shall be beaten to pieces, and all the hires thereof shall be burned with the fire, and all the idols thereof will I lay desolate: for she gathered it of the hire of an harlot, and they shall return to the hire of an harlot.

tokens.text: thereof shall be beaten to pieces

verses.text_plain: Therefore I will wail and howl, I will go stripped and naked: I will make a wailing like the dragons, and mourning as the owls.
verses.verse_html:
8Therefore I will wail and howl, I will go stripped and naked: I will make a wailing like the dragons, and mourning as the owls. ▼
▼ owls: Heb. daughters of the owl

footnotes.body_text: ▼ owls: Heb. daughters of the owl
footnotes.body_html: ▼ owls: Heb. daughters of the owl

verses.text_plain: For her wound is incurable; for it is come unto Judah; he is come unto the gate of my people, even to Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html:
9For her wound is incurable; for it is come unto Judah; he is come unto the gate of my people, even to Jerusalem. ▼
▼ her…: or, she is grievously sick of her wounds

footnotes.body_text: ▼ her…: or, she is grievously sick of her wounds
footnotes.body_html: ▼ her…: or, she is grievously sick of her wounds

verses.text_plain: Declare ye it not at Gath, weep ye not at all: in the house of Aphrah roll thyself in the dust.
verses.verse_html:
10Declare ye it not at Gath, weep ye not at all: in the house of Aphrah roll thyself in the dust. ▼
▼ Aphrah: that is, Dust

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Aphrah: that is, Dust

verses.text_plain: Pass ye away, thou inhabitant of Saphir, having thy shame naked: the inhabitant of Zaanan came not forth in the mourning of Beth–ezel; he shall receive of you his standing.
verses.verse_html:
11Pass ye away, thou inhabitant of Saphir, having thy shame naked: the inhabitant of Zaanan came not forth in the mourning of Beth–ezel; he shall receive of you his standing. ▼
▼ thou…: or, thou that dwellest fairly
 , ▼
▼ inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress
 , ▼
▼ Zaanan: or, The country of flocks
 , ▼
▼ Beth–ezel: or, A place near

footnotes.body_text: ▼ thou…: or, thou that dwellest fairly
footnotes.body_html: ▼ thou…: or, thou that dwellest fairly

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Zaanan: or, The country of flocks
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Zaanan: or, The country of flocks
▼ Beth–ezel: or, A place near

verses.text_plain: For the inhabitant of Maroth waited carefully for good: but evil came down from the Lord unto the gate of Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html:
12For the inhabitant of Maroth waited carefully for good: but evil came down from the Lord unto the gate of Jerusalem. ▼
▼ inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress
 , ▼
▼ waited…: or, was grieved

footnotes.body_html: ▼ waited…: or, was grieved

verses.text_plain: O thou inhabitant of Lachish, bind the chariot to the swift beast: she is the beginning of the sin to the daughter of Zion: for the transgressions of Israel were found in thee.
verses.verse_html:
13O thou inhabitant of Lachish, bind the chariot to the swift beast: she is the beginning of the sin to the daughter of Zion: for the transgressions of Israel were found in thee. ▼
▼ inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress

verses.text_plain: Therefore shalt thou give presents to Moresheth–gath: the houses of Achzib shall be a lie to the kings of Israel.
verses.verse_html:
14Therefore shalt thou give presents to Moresheth–gath: the houses of Achzib shall be a lie to the kings of Israel. ▼
▼ to…: or, for Moresheth–gath
 , ▼
▼ Achzib: that is, A lie

footnotes.body_html: ▼ to…: or, for Moresheth–gath
▼ Achzib: that is, A lie

verses.text_plain: Yet will I bring an heir unto thee, O inhabitant of Mareshah: he shall come unto Adullam the glory of Israel.
verses.verse_html:
15Yet will I bring an heir unto thee, O inhabitant of Mareshah: he shall come unto Adullam the glory of Israel. ▼
▼ inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress
 , ▼
▼ he…: or, the glory of Israel shall, etc

footnotes.body_text: ▼ he…: or, the glory of Israel shall, etc
footnotes.body_html: ▼ he…: or, the glory of Israel shall, etc

verses.text_plain: Make thee bald, and poll thee for thy delicate children; enlarge thy baldness as the eagle; for they are gone into captivity from thee.
verses.verse_html: 16Make thee bald, and poll thee for thy delicate children; enlarge thy baldness as the eagle; for they are gone into captivity from thee.

tokens.text: for they are gone into captivity
